divs: sighting detailscms\mcm last evening while smoking a cigarette on the porch facing south, a diamond pattern of lights can be seen with four points of different colored lights. there are several previous sightings going back several years.
Summary: Diamond shapes colors of orange, green, blue, white
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Nampa
There were no other sightings in Nampa on or around February 18th 2011
